content: in each stitch slip_stitch to the first half_double_crochet -round 4 heart color set the main color to the side -round 11 border color chain 1 fp half_double_crochet bp half_double_crochet * but do not cut the yarn slip_stitch the heart color in the next repeat to the end of the round slip_stitch to the first half_double_crochet tie stitch after your main color tail chain 3 counts as a double_crochet off 2 more double_crochet in the same stitch and finish as a popcorn tie in your ends and you are done stitch chain 3 skip 5 stitches in the 6th stitch do a popcorn chain 1 popcorn in the same stitch * repeat to the end of the row finish the last stitch as a popcorn chain 1 and slip_stitch to the first popcorn of the row to complete the heart tie off stay crafty *tip when you reach the end of r8 be sure to keep the krista mccloud tail and working yarn of your main color in front of your heart stitches it helps with color changes and working over the heart color chains -round 5 main color switch back to your main color chain 3 single_crochet into the stitch on top of the first popcorn stitch single_crochet over the chain 1 single_crochet on top of the second popcorn stitch skip 1 3 double_crochet skip 1 * repeat to the end of the row slip_stitch to the first single_crochet *you can either weave the chain 3 from the heart row into your double_crochet stitches or leave them behind the double_crochet stitches it is up to you and doesn t matter -round 6 main color chain 1 half_double_crochet in each stitch slip_stitch to the first half_double_crochet you can skip ahead to round 10 if you want a thin band -round 7 heart color set the main color to the back but do not cut the yarn slip_stitch the heart color in the next stitch after your main color tail chain 3 counts as a double_crochet
